snapshot.blocks.big-bang.copy.body: Keep answers accurate as your product, policies, and audience evolve.
snapshot.blocks.big-bang.copy.headline: A living knowledge base that grows with you.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.0.body: Accordion, list, and card structures with responsive spacing controls.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.0.title: Layouts
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.1.body: Role-based typography for titles, questions, answers, and CTAs.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.1.title: Typography
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.2.body: Light and dark mode support with brand color control.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.2.title: Themes
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.subhead: Control radius, shadows, borders, spacing, and typography in a visual editor built for brand consistency.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.title: Total design control
snapshot.blocks.cta.copy.headline: Build a better FAQ experience
snapshot.blocks.cta.copy.subheadline: Start free, publish fast, and keep your FAQ current across every page and language.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.0.title: Edge delivery
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.1.body: Up to 29 languages with override support.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.1.title: Localization
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.2.title: SEO
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.subhead: Combine localization, SEO, and edge delivery in one system so global pages stay fast and clear.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.title: Global delivery by default
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.headline: How the FAQ widget works
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.subheadline: From AI drafting to localization and SEO, these are the systems that keep answers accurate and discoverable.
snapshot.blocks.page-meta.copy.description: How the FAQ widget works: SEO, localization, publish flow, and AI-assisted editing.
snapshot.blocks.page-meta.copy.title: FAQ features - Clickeen
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.0.body: Standard script embed and scriptless iframe options.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.0.title: Embed modes
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.1.body: Explicit publish flow for live updates.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.1.title: Publish control
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.2.body: Styles, content, and languages combine without forks.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.2.title: Composability
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.subhead: Use standard or scriptless embeds and keep live updates predictable with explicit publish control.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.title: Made for production sites
snapshot.blocks.split-ai.copy.headline: Describe it once. AI drafts the rest.
snapshot.blocks.split-ai.copy.subheadline: Generate structured drafts inside the editor, then accept, edit, or reject each suggestion before publish.
snapshot.blocks.split-composable.copy.headline: Publish once. Update every page.
snapshot.blocks.split-composable.copy.subheadline: Edit once in one source, then publish and push the latest answers to every live embed.
snapshot.blocks.split-global.copy.headline: Up to 29 languages in one widget.
snapshot.blocks.split-global.copy.subheadline: Serve translated answers automatically and fine-tune wording manually when brand voice or nuance matters.
snapshot.blocks.steps-diff.copy.items.0.body: Server-side rendering keeps your answers indexable with near-zero layout shift.
snapshot.blocks.steps-diff.copy.items.0.title: Google sees every word
snapshot.blocks.steps-diff.copy.items.1.body: Automatic JSON-LD helps search engines surface your answers.
snapshot.blocks.steps-diff.copy.items.1.title: Rich snippets
snapshot.blocks.steps-diff.copy.items.2.body: Point users to the specific answer they need with a stable URL.
snapshot.blocks.steps-diff.copy.items.2.title: Deep linking
snapshot.blocks.steps-diff.copy.subhead: Server-rendered answers, schema output, and deep links help search engines index and surface the right content.
snapshot.blocks.steps-diff.copy.title: Search engines can read your answers
snapshot.blocks.steps-eco.copy.items.0.body: Every publish is versioned, so teams can iterate with control.
snapshot.blocks.steps-eco.copy.items.0.title: Versioned changes
snapshot.blocks.steps-eco.copy.items.1.body: Live content changes only after explicit publish.
snapshot.blocks.steps-eco.copy.items.1.title: Publish boundary
snapshot.blocks.steps-eco.copy.items.2.body: Milliseconds matter. We deliver answers from the location nearest your user.
snapshot.blocks.steps-eco.copy.items.2.title: Edge-Cached
snapshot.blocks.steps-eco.copy.subhead: Versioned publishing and explicit live boundaries keep frequent updates controlled for teams.
snapshot.blocks.steps-eco.copy.title: Reliable by design
